resources.string: You can find out whether you are overweight, underweight or ideal weight.

A normal weight BMI (18.5 to 24.9) suggests a weight that is generally considered healthy for a given height, minimizing the risk of weight-related health issues. However, it\'s important to note that BMI doesn\'t account for factors like muscle mass, bone density, and distribution of fat, so it may not perfectly reflect an individual\'s health status.
